channel.title: test on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in test on a neuro[log]

item.title: Second Post
item.description: Working on the template Now I have to customise this template a little more. I think I like this static site thing. It’s much less heavy than Wix or Wordpress. Maybe I’ll turn this into a micro-blogging site as well. Not sure yet.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my new blog. I just deployed it. It’s ready to go. I’m doing this because I have some things to say. And I’ve decided to say them. In public. It’s a brave step.
